publ: by The Focused Game Dev, LLC
name: Calmpocalypse
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Trying times like these demand that we work to control our anxieties. Mental health maintenance is especially important as we begin to feel more isolated. The goal of the Calmpocalypse Flash Briefing is to provide practical advice and motivation that will help to nourish your mind, body, and SOUL!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
